title: Weak pound boosts Bunzl profits
text:
Bunzl's customers are not stockpiling ahead of Brexit despite a growing fear the UK is heading for a no-deal departure from the EU.

"The last time Britain was set to leave the EU [March 29] our customers were preparing by buying more ahead of that date," said Frank van Zanten, chief executive of Bunzl. "That is not happening this time around."

Britain was due to leave the the EU five months ago but the date was deferred until October 31.

Speaking as the FTSE 100 member announced interim results, Mr van Zanten said the company was itself preparing for Britain crashing out of the EU without a trade deal by investigating how to strengthen its supply chain.
